The APP of Dolomiti Superski is supposed to be a real online ski guide for those who want to discover the world’s largest ski carousel and is supported by all the operating systems of the most common smart phones. It has new graphics and a modern navigation: horizontal movements (swipe) allow users to switch from one of the 12 ski areas of Dolomiti Superski to the next in numerical order, while vertical movements (scroll) lead to various menu options, functions and services within the chosen ski area. If the GPS function of the device is activated, when the APP is launched, the system will lead to a contents page for the Dolomiti Superski ski area in which the user is located. One can login through the "MyDolomiti" community, after having registered (free of charge) to use the services. The APP offers useful information such as the open/closed status of individual lifts and slopes in real time, opening hours of the lifts, breaks, weather forecasts, points of interest such as ski schools, ski rentals, infopoints, Pick-up Box, as well as descriptions and contacts. 
The user will also find other interesting and popular functions, such as the Performance Check, Tracking option to record the route taken while skiing, Routing which will navigate you to a predetermined point on the slopes. By reaching certain goals with the "Tracking" function, the user will be assigned interesting Badges - a great way to challenge yourself! And finally, you get to play too since the registered members of the APP-community can also have fun with the APP's game functions, creating their network of friends, who must also be registered members and in possession of a Dolomiti Superski ski pass and challenging each other throughout the ski season.
Discover the new APP’s full potential watching the video tutorials.

MTBs and E-MTBs are equipped with a chassis, some of which are associated with quite complex settings.

You usually have not adjusted the chassis optimally and therefore you have less riding pleasure and you also endanger your safety.

SAGLY helps you to find optimal settings for your mountain bike and to continuously improve and document them.

MTB Suspension App to manage all your setups

Setups can be managed, edited, copied and much more. Your setups are shown in a nice and clear way. A notes field helps you to keep track of additional info, like what weather you created the setup in, and so on. Adjustments for wet conditions are calculated automatically.

Another feature the MTB Suspension App supports the rider with suggested solutions for problems with the chassis. This helps the rider to continuously improve the setup, while riding.

The balance feature checks if your setup is balanced between the rear and the front and also gives hints how to improve and balance your suspension setup.

In addition, the you receive general tips & tricks as well as an explanation of terms for optimizing and maintaining the chassis.

Another function supports you with suggested solutions for problems with the chassis. In this way you can tune your mtb setup.

The EASY SETUP GUIDE is part of the MTB suspension app SAGLY guiding you through a base setup by using the SAG. The user inputs the suspension part’s travel and the used travel when standing on the bike. This SAG calculator calculates the SAG based on this inputs and gives hints based on the result.

The EASY SETUP GUIDE of SAGLY helps you to find an appropriate base setup by giving you recommendations for your tire pressure based on your weight and riding terrain.

EXPLORE SETUPS

Explore setups from other riders in the MTB suspension app SAGLY. Filter and Search by frame, fork, shock or tire-models. Sort by number of high-fives (likes), number of comments, and recently created. The setups of other riders are displayed with all information about the rider and the bikes the setup is created for.

You can high-five (like) those setups, create comments or even try those setups out and copy them to your setups.

A better suspension setup on your mountain bike means not only more comfort and more safety but also more fun and also faster riding.

Why SAGLY?

Mountain biking is not only a sport, hobby or lifestyle in our opinion. We associate mountain biking with much more. 

When you ride your mountain bike, you experience the nature, improve your physical and mental health, you get to meet other people, you encounter pleasure and enjoyment, you strengthen your will and sometimes you learn how to get up again. 

Those are just a view reasons, why we think it is worth working on an innovative mobile app like SAGLY. SAGLY’S technology helps you not only to document, tune and compare your mountain bike settings, but also to enjoy a really great activity, mountain biking

Are you a coach who actively tracks their player’s progress? Or are you a parent of a young tennis talent looking to contribute more than just emotional support?

If so, then this app is for you! Top Tennis Tracker is for anyone who wants to help a tennis player improve their game! It gives you a way to collect crucial match-data in order to analyze whether your player is on track with their performance goals. 

We all want to play better than in our previous match. The question is though: How well did you actually do in your previous match? 

Top Tennis Tracker reveals among many other things, how many winners and unforced errors you hit, where you hit them, from which position and with which intention. Also, it helps you keep track of your serve percentages and momentum changes in a match. 

Wouldn’t you want to carefully analyze if a lucky shot, a choke-moment, or a discussion with the umpire really did have a lasting effect on the outcome of the match? You can now!

UNIQUE FEATURES:
Unlike any other tennis-score tracking app, Top Tennis Tracker gives you the following:

* USER-FRIENDLY DESIGN. Designed with the highest user-experience standards, by tennis players, and for tennis players. Visually appealing, intuitive, fast, and easy to use.

* NO AUTHORIZATIONS REQUESTED. Built for performance. It will not request authorization for any functionality of your smartphone. 

* NO LOGIN REQUIRED. Created with ease of use in mind. No login of any kind is required. 

* RUNS WITHOUT AN INTERNET CONNECTION. Reliable and supporting a long battery life. It runs natively, it doesn’t sync to a server and all data is stored on your phone only - for your use only. 

* YOU CAN STILL ENJOY WATCHING THE MATCH! Top Tennis Tracker was built adhering to one most important principle. You, the user, must be able to still enjoy just watching the match. This is achieved by:
** giving you the option to track only 1 of the following 3 tracking aspects: Momentum, Serve & Return, or Rally Details. This decreases the number of entry-options you as a user need to attend to. 
** enabling you to track only the player you’re interested in, simplifying the use of the app when analyzing the match.

* FREE UPDATES. Currently, Top Tennis Tracker offers an analysis of Matches. In the future however, you will be able to analyze your player’s performance over time, i.e. across many matches. Simple graphs will show you how your player’s serve & return stats develop across a whole year, among many other aspects. 

* FREE VERSION. Top Tennis Tracker has a subscription model. But you can use a FREE version of the app, with no strings attached. The free version offers only Momentum tracking and analysis features, while the PRO version also offers Serve & Return and Rally Details tracking, whereby Rally Details include much more than just Winners and Unforced errors.
